FuncDef: The display monitor-link group command displays information about all Monitor Link groups or a specified Monitor Link group. The display monitor-link group command displays information about all Monitor Link groups or a specified Monitor Link group.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays information about a specified Monitor Link group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 24.

Displays information about all Monitor Link groups.
-

ExtraInfo: You can run the display monitor-link group command to view information about a Monitor Link group. The displayed information includes the name and status of each member interface.
